song_lyric:
关上了门 留下温暖
关上了灯 留下黑暗
Turn it off  anyway

关上了嘴 默契变成音乐
关上耳朵 ?密变成石头
Turn it off  anyway

I turn off the TV turn off the radio
Turn off the microphone
Turn off the computer
Turn them all off
anyway
I turn off the engine
Turn off the microwave
Turn off my mind
Turn off my greed
Turn them all off
Turn off the world

沉默中 黑暗中 在妈妈的子宫?游泳
快乐中 悲伤中 愤怒中 在关上那一刻
All format

关上你的花言巧语
是不是就可以看见爱情
Turn it off
any way

关上了音乐 留住了画面
关上了画面 留住了时间
Turn them all off
Turn off the world
I turn off my guitar
Turn off the drums
Turn off the violin
Turn off my vocal
Turn them all
……
